title: Single Room
description: These rooms are assigned to one person or a couple. It may have one or more beds, but the size of the bed depends on the hotel. Some single rooms have a twin bed, most will have a double, few will have a queen bed.

title: Mini Suite or Junior Suite
description: Averaging 40-45 square meters, the Junior Suite is an elegant studio-style guest accommodation furnished with a queen-sized bed, a writing desk, two-seater sofa and coffee table, and a spacious toilet and bath.

title: Hollywood Twin Room
description: Hollywood Twin rooms feature two single beds lined up next to each other, allowing the room to be used as a twin or double. Desks in the rooms also make them ideal for single business travelers. The shower booth, wash area and toilet layout is compact, allowing the space to be used to the fullest.

title: Suite/Executive Suite
description: The Executive Suite is a stylish one-bedroom suite with king sized bed decorated in neutral tones, 46 square meters in size and with a separate living and dining area. Additional amenities for the suites include a washing machine & dryer.

title: Executive Room
description: A hotel room more orientated towards business (executive) guests. Usually with a desk or space for guests to get some work done.

title: Master Suite
description: Master suite is a large room that has a private bathroom and several other amenities depending on the individual's needs and preferences. This can include a space for lounging, a fireplace, a small office with a door and even a walk-in closet.

title: Penthouse Suite
description: A Penthouse is typically an apartment on the highest floor of an apartment building. It usually takes up less than half of the entire (flat) roof of the building. Originally the word penthouse meant a small building with a sloped roof.

title: Aparthotel rooms / Apart-style rooms
description: The aparthotel offers its own kitchen and more space and a more homelike living environment than a standard hotel. Especially for longer stays, an apartment hotel is also a much cheaper option than a hotel.
